name: play-ts-cucumber
description: Playwright Cucumber TS framework - The easiest way to learn

scripts.debug: cross-env ENV=heroku PWDEBUG=1 DEBUG=pw:api cucumber-js --profile debug --config=config/cucumber.js
scripts.test: cross-env ENV=heroku FORCE_COLOR=0 cucumber-js --profile only:client:A --config=config/cucumber.js || true
scripts.test:failed: cross-env ENV=heroku cucumber-js --profile rerun --config=config/cucumber.js @rerun.txt || true && npm run posttest

author: Alex Sicoe & Koushik
